description: After running away from home, Krystal is transported to a faraway kingdom where an evil tyrant is bent on taking the crown - and Krystal's hand in marriage. But when she falls in love with the rightful heir to the throne, she must make an impossible sacrifice her one chance at happiness or face the destruction of an entire kingdom.
author: Cheri Chesley
